titles: ['Join us at our 14th Annual S3C Golf Classic', '2022-05-07']
['Place holder for UC Public Safety Benevolent Fund']
text: ["This year we are partnering with UC Public Safety to host our annual golf tournament to have a greater impact in Cincinnati's urban neighborhoods.", '', 'More details and pictures need to go here.']

['Our ambition is to lend support to the cancer community on every level and avenue revealed to us.  Whether it is providing financial assistance to families for cancer-related expenses, hosting collection drives for essential items, partnering with clubs and organizations to host fundraisers, volunteering our time at local charity events, raising funds for cancer research, or simply encouraging individuals to find hope, we are on a mission to better our community; specifically, those faced with the varied challenges cancer poses.']

titles: ['S3C Success Depends on our Sponsoring Partners']
text: ["Sponsorship dollars are essential to the success of our annual events.  S3C seeks to underwrite the cost of our events so that every penny will directly impact the Cancer Community.  To date, we've successfully covered the expenses and then some from generous corporate sponsors.  Thank you for ensuring every donation impacts a family in our Cancer Community!"]
['S3C is an Ohio 501 (c)(3) non-profit organization recognized by the IRS, and all donations to S3C are tax-deductible in accordance with IRS regulations.']
